 Panzertron arrived on the scene a moment to late,
he's just in time to see the intruder blasting out of
the water.

  "Panzertron to command, intruder has escaped. Hull
damage....minor easily repairable."


  "Very well Major return to the bridge,".

=====
When the going gets tough,
the tough go get a tank!
